cast.name: 马辛·多洛辛斯基 Marcin Dorocinski
西蒙·威斯尼斯基 Szymon Wisniewski
沃伊切赫·麦克瓦尔达斯基 Wojciech Mecwaldowski
加布里埃拉·乔耶卡 Gabriela Chojecka
奥尔佳·特雷姆巴赫 Olga Trembach

writer.name: 鲍瑞斯·兰考什 Borys Lankosz

director.name: 鲍瑞斯·兰考什 Borys Lankosz

introduction: Commissioner Edward Popielski is expelled from the Lviv police when an epileptic attack causes him to lose a criminal chase and his temper on the police chief. He becomes a Latin tutor to make ends meet. An astrologer, Luba Bajdykowa is found murdered. Next to the victim, the police find Hebrew characters arranged in a strange code. Unable to crack the code the police appoint Popielski on the case. A beautiful Renata Sperling, Popielski's ex-student visits him to request his help with finding her employer Countess Bekierska. Another victim is found with a similar code next to her.
